  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      public Staff(String staffID, String name, String role, String gender, int age)
      Constructs a new `Staff` object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The unique staff ID of the staff member. The ID must be validated via `isValidStaffID`.
      name - The name of the staff member.
      role - The role of the staff member.
      gender - The gender of the staff member.
      age - The age of the staff member. Must be between 18 and 100.

  • Method Details

    • isValidStaffID

      public boolean isValidStaffID(String staffID)
      Validates the format of the provided staff ID. The staff ID must be 4 characters long, with the first character being either 'D', 'P', or 'A', and the next three characters being digits.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The staff ID to validate.
      Returns:
      `true` if the staff ID is valid, `false` otherwise.

    • toCSVString

      public String toCSVString()
      Converts the staff information into a CSV (Comma Separated Values) string. The resulting string will contain the staff ID, name, role, gender, and age, separated by commas.
      Returns:
      A CSV string representation of the staff information.

    • getStaffID

      public String getStaffID()
      Gets the staff ID of the staff member.
      Returns:
      The staff ID of the staff member.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the staff member.
      Returns:
      The name of the staff member.

    • getRole

      public String getRole()
      Gets the role of the staff member.
      Returns:
      The role of the staff member.

    • getGender

      public String getGender()
      Gets the gender of the staff member.
      Returns:
      The gender of the staff member.

    • getAge

      public int getAge()
      Gets the age of the staff member.
      Returns:
      The age of the staff member.

    • setStaffID

      public void setStaffID(String id)
      Sets the staff ID of the staff member. The staff ID must not be empty and must follow the valid format as defined in `isValidStaffID`.
      Parameters:
      id - The new staff ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the staff ID is null, empty, or invalid.

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the staff member. The name must not be empty or null.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name of the staff member.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the name is null or empty.

    • setRole

      public void setRole(String role)
      Sets the role of the staff member. The role is a simple string representing the staff member's job title or function.
      Parameters:
      role - The new role of the staff member.

    • setGender

      public void setGender(String gender)
      Sets the gender of the staff member.
      Parameters:
      gender - The new gender of the staff member.

    • setAge

      public void setAge(int age)
      Sets the age of the staff member. The age must be between 18 and 100.
      Parameters:
      age - The new age of the staff member.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the age is less than 18 or greater than 100.
